game.name: Brutes.io
game.description:
Created by Miniclip, Brutes.io is multiplayer fighting game highly appreciated among a wider group of kids, especially boys. The best formula to make your win in this action game is to kill your opponents and eat them to have a stronger and bigger body. This free online real-time combat multiplayer game makes sure that you will have the fun and excitement that you have not taken before.

The cool graphics of this beautifully-designed game will give your eyes an unforgettable experience. In order to become the super-brute, all you need to do is to enter into a battle against the real players and kill them using the smart moves and techniques. The key mantra of surviving in this latest fighting game is to punch other players hard, control a brute and make your body stronger in terms of size and strength. There are many ways through which you develop your fights in a rich, 3D condition. As soon as you continue killing other players and gathering the loot from them, it would help to prove yourself as a powerful player in the game.

In this completely action-packed IO fighting game, you are for sure to enjoy the feeling of becoming the strongest, meanest and biggest super brute by applying some tricky moves. Open your mind always to get the position on the top of the leaderboard. This latest flash game features evolving and highly customizable characters. There is no need to hurry. With getting more and more stronger in this free online game, you can develop your characters stats slowly & slowly. You would have to face the heavy damage if you fall down while fighting with your rivals. All the best for having unlimited fun!
